授業の概要・背景: Intensive English is a four-skills course to develop communication skills by listening, speaking, reading and writing about various biweekly topics. Students will also study essential grammar, phrases and vocabulary for practical communication, while developing study skills to help them further improve their English independently.
授業方法: This class will be conducted face-to-face. The class will be held in English as a communicative 4-skills workshop. Active participation is expected from all students. For students who are permitted to take the course online, the data from the face-to-face class will be recorded and shared via a URL link posted in the LUNA class page. Class assignments can be submitted via email.
